Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.index.schema.fusion

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SlotSelector
    Given a set of values selects a slot to use.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FusionIndexAccessor  
    FusionIndexBase<T>
    Acting as a simplifier for the multiplexing that is going in inside a fusion index.
    FusionIndexCapability  
    FusionIndexPopulator  
    FusionIndexProvider
    This index provider act as one logical index but is backed by four physical indexes, the number, spatial, temporal native indexes, and the general purpose lucene index.
    FusionIndexReader  
    FusionIndexSampler  
    FusionIndexUpdater  
    FusionSlotSelector30
    Selector for "lucene+native-3.x".
    InstanceSelector<T>
    Selects an instance given a certain slot.
    LazyInstanceSelector<T>
    Selects an instance given a certain slot and instantiate them lazy.
    NativeLuceneFusionIndexProviderFactory30  
    SlotSelector.NullInstance
